text: Bloc Party is an EP of songs in Bloc Party's first two (UK) singles: "She's Hearing Voices" and "Banquet/Staying Fat". The EP was released on May 24, 2004 throughout Europe. It was Bloc Party's first V2 Records EP. This EP was released later in Japan in August, and then in the United States in September of the same year. == Track listing == # "Banquet" – 3:19 # "Staying Fat" – 2:23 # "She's Hearing Voices" – 3:30 # "The Marshals Are Dead" – 3:52 # "The Answer" – 4:04 # "Banquet" (Phones Disco Edit) – 5:26 Category:2004 albums Category:Bloc Party albums
title: Bloc Party (EP)
